publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2149 Brian Adam: European Football Championships—That the Parliament notes the success, both sporting and economic, of the recent European Football Championships in Portugal; believes that Scotland would benefit greatly from hosting the championships in 2012 or at any time in the future, and calls on the Scottish Executive to provide the necessary funding and improvements to Scotland’s infrastructure and to work with the Scottish Football Association to ensure a successful solo bid.
S2M-2149 European Football Championships (lodged on 13 December 2004) Michael Matheson*
S2M-2149 European Football Championships (lodged on 13 December 2004) Bruce Crawford*, Rob Gibson*, Richard Lochhead*, Alex Neil*, Mike Pringle*

S2M-2149 Brian Adam: European Football Championships—That the Parliament notes the success, both sporting and economic, of the recent European Football Championships in Portugal; believes that Scotland would benefit greatly from hosting the championships in 2012 or at any time in the future, and calls on the Scottish Executive to provide the necessary funding and improvements to Scotland’s infrastructure and to work with the Scottish Football Association to ensure a successful solo bid. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Bruce Crawford, Rob Gibson, Richard Lochhead, Alex Neil, Mike Pringle
S2M-2149 European Football Championships (lodged on 13 December 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2149 European Football Championships (lodged on 13 December 2004) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Jim Mather*
S2M-2149 European Football Championships (lodged on 13 December 2004) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S2M-2149 European Football Championships (lodged on 13 December 2004) John Swinburne*
